definitions.definition: Resembling or having the consistency of mush; semiliquid, pasty, or granular.
definitions.example: I don't especially like mushy oatmeal.
The brake pedal is mushy sometimes when I step on it.

definitions.definition: Overly sappy, corny, or cheesy; maudlin.
definitions.example: Skip the mushy, romantic scenes and get to the action.
